title: disconnecting after 30 mins
body: in any game mode or type from norm 5v5 to a private 1v1 match i will disconnect after 30 mins of fine game time and if i try to join back it want let me so i have to wait till the games over. i just want to know if anyone else has had this and if anyone knows how to stop it from happening it would be great. thanks for the help.

replies.body: How are you connected to the internet? Is there anything in place to conserve data usage if it believes it's not in use?
